subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Since returning to their spacious park with a 4-8 record last week, the Mets have gone 6-1 and their pitching is among the best in the National League.
snippet: Since returning to their spacious park with a 4-8 record last week, the Mets have gone 6-1 and their pitching is among the best in the National League.
